are there any still updated third party driver station for linux. I’m trying to do a silly offseason project that would require it to run on linux.

I haven’t used these, but here are some options:

github.com

GitHub - Redrield/Conductor: A cross-platform FRC Driver Station written with...

A cross-platform FRC Driver Station written with Rust and React

github.com

GitHub - FRC-Utilities/QDriverStation: Cross-platform clone of the FRC Driver Station

Cross-platform clone of the FRC Driver Station

Conductor seems like it was updated most recently.
